name: Quantum Lab
description:
Game created for gamejam - https://itch.io/jam/gamesplusjam. Theme Time.

Unfortunately, due to family-things I was able to work on it only one and a half day so this is mostly a showcase of simple time engine I wrote with 2 simple puzzle-levels.

Also...  my voice sound so cringy...

Forgot to mention some artists in game - will fix that in update after jam:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/3-skyboxes-2-255...
